chapter.title: Ramping up to the Fastlane: A Beginner’s Guide to Learning and Using Kubernetes
chapter.simpara: Emerging as the defacto standard of orchestrating containerized, microservice workloads, Kubernetes is quickly becoming a fundamental training goala. In this hands-on session, you will learn how to effectively utilize the Kubernetes technology across the various Dev, Security, Data, and Ops perspectives. Starting with a single workload and then working towards a complete, containerized service deployment, you will interact with and explore the features provided by Kubernetes to leverage the scalable, resilient, manageable environment for the workloads.
